fields.description: Android has a common UI pattern for number fields: a text field with plus and minus buttons, be it vertically or horizontally. I think that Titanium could create a custom widget for that, instead of offering an iOS picker emulator - that's very awful for UX in Android, since it's not a real, "native", common pattern on Android apps.
fields.summary: Android: Create a number stepper widget
